# preferredIOBufferDuration

**Instance Property**

The preferred I/O buffer duration, in seconds.

## Declaration

```swift
var preferredIOBufferDuration: TimeInterval { get }
```

## Discussion

The value of this property indicates the buffer duration selected using the [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioSession/setPreferredIOBufferDuration(_:)] method.

To determine the actual buffer duration, query the [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioSession/ioBufferDuration] property.

## Configuring I/O buffer duration

- **ioBufferDuration**: The current I/O buffer duration, in seconds.
- **setPreferredIOBufferDuration(_:)**: Sets the preferred audio I/O buffer duration.
